title: Math 222
body: I’m taking Math 222 for the spring semester. I’ve heard some brutal things about Math 222 and want to start preparing for it early. Are there any helpful resources I can use to study?
comments: look up professor leonard’s calc courses on youtube :D
You can go through Paul’s Online Math Notes (website). Has info on all topics from Calc 2 afaik, so you can do the learning the theory (and a bit of practice) part from there
if Ashley is still a TA, she's incredible
